definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dream, rave (Ar. had-a talk deliriously, Syr. hdo0, in Lexx., id., cf. also Vrss; v. esp. Bo:Hieroz. ii. 56, p. 680; ed. Rosenm. vol. i. 782).—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. pl. [[הׂזִים]] Is 56:10 [[לאׁ יוּכְלוּ]] [[שׁׂכְּבִים]] ´[[לִנְבָּׂחַ ה]]of dogs, metaph. of false prophets.
